response.overview: On November 12th, 2005, Penfold strolled into a friendâ€™s basement in New Brunswick, New Jersey to play a secret impromptu show to a small unknowing audience (literally, most of the audience didn't know who they were). The band, still close friends, had decided to attempt a reunion but wanted to have a go at a test run to see if they could actually pull it off.
response.title: Elf Pond
